interestingFact: India is the birthplace of chess, yoga, and the decimal system.
Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.
Japan has more than 80,000 people over the age of 100.
Brazil has the largest rainforest in the world – the Amazon.
Russia spans 11 time zones across two continents.
Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world's lakes combined.
The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only remaining wonder of the ancient world.
China is home to the world’s largest man-made structure – the Great Wall.
Iceland uses almost 100% renewable energy for its electricity needs.
Switzerland is home to the world’s longest tunnel – the Gotthard Base Tunnel.
